definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: creep, move lightly, move about (chiefly P) (Ar. rama4a touch gently (Kam Frey); NH [[רְמָשִׂים]] creeping things (rare));—
subj. ground, [[הָאֲדָמָה]] ´[[כּׂל אֲשֶׁר ת]]: all with which the ground creeps (teems), i.e. all creeping things, Le 20:55 (H), Ge 9:2 (P).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: creep, [[עַל־הָאֲדָמָה]] De 4:18, Ge 7:8 (P), [[עַל־הָאָרֶץ]] Le 11:44 (H), Ge 1:30 (P); [[הָרֶמֶשׂ הָרׂמֵשׂ עַל־הָאֲדָמָה]] Ez Eze 38:20, [[עַל־הָאָרֶץ]] Ge 1:26, Ge 7:14, Ge 8:17 (all P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: move lightly, glide about, of water animals, [[כָּל־נֶפֶשׂ]] ([[בַּמַּיִם]]) [[הַחַיׇּה הָרׂמֶחֶת]] Le 11:46 (H), Ge 1:21 (P), cf. Ps 69:35.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in gen. move about, of all land-animals, [[עַל־הָאָרֶץ]] Ge 1:28, Ge 7:21, Ge 8:19 (all P); specif. of wild beasts prowling at night Ps 104:20.
